column1: San Juan de Aznalfarache is a city located in the province of Seville
column3: the city has a population of 20

column2: San Juan is in the metropolitan area of Seville
column3: to which it lies on an opposite bank of the Guadalquivir river. The city is linked by two road bridges and a pedestrian one to the Sevillian district of Triana on the Isla de La Cartuja.

column1: San Juan lies to the north of Gelves
column2: northeast of Mairena del Aljarafe and south of Tomares
column3: which all also make up Seville's metropolitan area.
